title: TMZ Video Brings Down Ray Rice
teaser: How did a gossip site obtain footage of Ray Rice punching his then-fiancee, and why didn't traditional sports journalist break the story first?
contentencoded:
NPR media correspondent David Folkenflik weighs in on how the TMZ video of Ray Rice punching his then-fiance led the Baltimore Ravens to drop Rice and the NFL to suspend him indefinitely.

But how did TMZ get the video, and why didn’t traditional sports journalist break the story first?

Guest

  • David Folkenflik, NPR media correspondent. He tweetsÂ @davidfolkenflik.
